name: SHAPETALK
description:
In a petty universe, two young women find adventure among the stars.

Spacefixer is a short (currently around 30 minutes long) kinetic novel about Lu, a monk in training who decides to venture out into a vast galaxy full of interconnected planets and civilizations. Despite that, it's mostly a pretty low stakes story about some people hanging out and possibly falling in love.

Featuring all custom backgrounds,  portraits,  music, and even fonts for some reason.

Currently in development, with only the first part released!
